snippet: Daniel S. Loeb, the hedge fund manager of Third Point and one of Yahoo's largest shareholders, will be in Silicon Valley this week to interview board candidates in preparation for a possible proxy fight.
abstract: Daniel S. Loeb, the hedge fund manager of Third Point and one of Yahoo's largest shareholders, will be in Silicon Valley this week to interview board candidates in preparation for a possible proxy fight.

headline.main: Third Point's Loeb Seeking Candidates for Yahoo's Board
